mgINetworkNearestNeighborsCommand.h
featId
INetworkNearestNeighborsCommand
SetNumberOfNeighbors

System::Void SetNumberOfNeighbors (  System::Int32  number  ) 
 

This method is used to set the maximum number of neighbors that can be returned by this command.

Parameters:
number The number of neighbors that can be returned by this command.
Returns:
Returns nothing
